cu.explanation_en: Setting the MCC to a negative value of -1 will cause the gNB to fail during initialization as the MCC must be non-negative.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum power to an out-of-range value of 100 dBm will cause the gNB to fail during initialization as the value exceeds the maximum allowed power.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大功率設定為超出範圍的值 100 dBm 會導致 gNB 在初始化期間失敗，因為該值超過允許的最大功率。
